entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 29.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 29.0°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 31 %
Humidex: 30
Dewpoint: 10.3°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers or thunderstorms late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers with thunderstorms beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
